com.qubitpi.circe

Class AvroPacker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pig.EvalFunc<org.apache.pig.data.DataByteArray>
      • com.qubitpi.circe.AvroPacker

  • @Immutable
 @ThreadSafe
public class AvroPacker
extends org.apache.pig.EvalFunc<org.apache.pig.data.DataByteArray>
    An UDF that transforms a tuple into a serialized Avro row in byte array.

    This UDF is designed for HBase data storage efficiency. According to https://hbase.apache.org/book.html#physical.view, a row key is repeated for each column qualifier. This is going to be a lot of row key and timestamp duplications which together waste too much storage spaces in HBase. A good solution for it is to deduplicate by collapsing all of the value columns of a single row key into one value column. This UDF does this deduplication.

    AvroPacker is an Eval Function. The UDF collapses the non-row-key columns of a row into a single Avro record and then avro-serializes it into byte array so that each column value can be retrieved very fast using Avro API on the byte array later when an HBase row is retrieved back.

    Here is an example usage in a Pig script: 

     
 REGISTER UDF-<version>.jar;
 DEFINE AvroPacker com.qubitpi.circe.AvroPacker('schema.avsc', '/path/to/schema.avsc');

 relation =
     FOREACH relation
         GENERATE
             (chararray) row_key                                    AS row_key:chararray,
             (bytearray) AvroPacker(column1, column2, ..., columnN) AS values:bytearray;
    Note that the schema.avsc is the schema of the Avro representation of the tuple being collapsed, i.e. column1, column2, ..., column N. The /path/to/schema.avsc is the path on HDFS. This means you will need to load the schema.avsc file to HDFS before running Pig script.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AvroPacker

        public AvroPacker(String schemaFileName,
                  String schemaFileHdfsPath)
           throws IOException
        Constructs a new AvroPacker with the specified path to the Avro schema for which to determine the type for input tuple.

        This constructor calls AvroPacker(Schema, String).

        Parameters:
        schemaFileName - The path to the Avro schema
        schemaFileHdfsPath - A singleton list of HDFS location of the Avro schema file
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any one of the constructor arguments is null
        IOException - if error occurs while parsing the schema file
